info.author: Fanstatic Developers
info.description:
js.chai
*******

Introduction
============

This library packages `chai.js`_ for `fanstatic`_.

.. _`fanstatic`: http://fanstatic.org
.. _`chai.js`: http://chaijs.com/

This requires integration between your web framework and ``fanstatic``,
and making sure that the original resources (shipped in the ``resources``
directory in ``js.chai``) are published to some URL.


How to use?
===========


You can import ``chai`` from ``js.chai`` and ``need`` it where you want
these resources to be included on a page::

  >>> from js.chai import chai
  >>> chai.need()


CHANGES
*******

3.2.0 (2015-08-12)
==================

- Initial release.
